extendedInfo.description: Precision Timer includes: Stop watch, Timer, Alarm and World Clock.Easy, simple and clean with the new Android Holo theme and loads of options, you will love this app.With simple and intuitive interface.This is the most accurate timer!STOPWATCH (chronograph):â Start and Stop from numbers.â Infinite laps count.â Runs in Background (without wasting battery, using system events).â Screen my times with all the saved laps.â Stay awake functionality (clicking the menu button).â Keep running (activate run in background by clicking the menu button).â 1/1000 seconds (milliseconds).TIMER (Countdown timer):â Add any counter time.â Selectable sound.â Reach notifications (you can see the remaining time in the notification bar, also you can pause, resume and stop).â Sound and vibrates for 5 seconds.â 1/1000 seconds (milliseconds).â Infinite saved timers.â Uses the alarm volume.ALARM (alarm clock):â Basic functionality of an Alarm.â Set Alarm name.â Set Alarm period.â Set Alarm snooze time.â Set Alarm Ringtone.â Set postpone Alarm by shaking the phone.â Set snooze time.â Set Mathematic operations to stop the Alarm.â Set Alarm volume auto increase.â Set Alarm vibration (it toggles if you select postpone by shake).â Set Crazy preferences (the Alarm sounds every minute for 3 times).â Uses the alarm volume.WORLD CLOCK (clock):â By default adds your current timezone.â Add any town.â Uses google places API.â Digital Clock.â Analog Clock.GENERAL FEATURES:â Fullscreen mode.â Swipe tabs.â Landscape mode.â Tablet mode.â 2 Holo themes.â Options with menu button.â Option to store on SD-CardFUTURE FEATUERS:â Voice recognition.â Reach notifications on Stopwatch.â Added DashClock widgetâ Add multiple timers and Stopwatch.â Improve World Clock section.PERMISSIONS EXPLANATION:VIBRATE: For timer and alarm ring.WAKE_LOCK: Prevent device from sleeping.INTERNET: To search for world clock and display ads.ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE: Checks if the device has internet.RECEIVE_BOOT_COMPLETED: To set Alarms when device reboot.REVIEWS:Reviewed by google engineers as the best application of its kind.You can see the review here: http://youtu.be/EnVqJEjuhuk?t=12m31sAnd the Interview that google engineers make me here: http://youtu.be/BN-SAvuUlxY?t=12m25sIf you like this application please think about buying the ad free version, by doing so you will help the development of my apps.

reviews.title: Works, but one annoyance
reviews.comment: 90% of the times I open the app it\'s a blank page, and I have to hit back a couple times before I see anything.
reviews.author: Andy Gilleand

reviews.title: Good app, but lack some functions
reviews.comment: Alarm ignores headset - I have a timer that I need to use while in the office, and there is no way to tell the app to send the notification to my headsets, and not to the device speaker
reviews.author: Claus Aranha

reviews.title: needs more alarm control
reviews.comment: The countdown timer rings for pre-set amount of time and stops. It should keep rining until the user turns it off. The user should be able to stop the ringing before it times out.
reviews.author: Charlene C

reviews.title: bug in alarm clock sgp 5.0
reviews.comment: alarm clock buggy on gingerbread sgp 5.0. won\'t hold time set. reverts to 8am when you close the app. also would appreciate drag and drop to move world clocks into chron order. perhaps you could downsize app by reducing the quite sophisticated city search function to a select from menu. otherwise this app is great. love the graphics, layout and all-in-one concept.
reviews.author: Stephen R

reviews.title: Very nice
reviews.comment: I can\'t stand people who cry. Its free man!!! Its a nice app well done.
reviews.author: Guy Johnson

reviews.title: Two features and a fix away from perfect
reviews.comment: I\'ve loaded nearly every stopwatch to time my workouts.  This has a fairly big display (still could be bigger IMO) and is very clean and intuitive.  I\'d like to see a RESET button DURING the elapsing stopwatch time so I immediately can start another session without having to first hit STOP and then RESET.  I\'d also like to see a lock screen feature.  One \"bug\" is that on the landscape view of the stopwatch the buttons disappear on at the bottom requiring I turn it back to landscape.  (The extra humongous CLOCK is awesome in landscape).  In any case  I\'m buying the full version..
reviews.author: Jim B

reviews.title: An improvement.
reviews.comment: I really like this timer. It is very user friendly and easy to use. I can see one small thing that I could suggest to improve the world clock. Add the date to the time display. This can be important at certain times. No pun intended. Otherwise a very neat app.   :-)
reviews.author: Uncle Rick

reviews.title: Horrible
reviews.comment: It always is closing while important trying to put in a Alarm or something. It happens everytime and when im looking for another place in the world clock it does the same thing. Its very annoying and irritating
reviews.author: Cassidy Egli

reviews.title: could Have been the best
reviews.comment: could have solved all my timing needs if not for the fact that the tone only plays once! It doesn\'t repeat over and over, so you will surely burn your food or sleep too long. So dumb! 4 in 1 tool, timer, stopwatch w lap, world clock, simple but all encompassing alarm. So disappointed! Clean, pretty interface w 2 skins, straight forward for the most part. So sad. I\'m on Android 4.2.1
reviews.author: Harold King

reviews.title: THANK YOU!
reviews.comment: This app is an excellent replacement for the original clock/timer that was idiotically removed with the Jellybean update. Thanks again!
reviews.author: Nate A

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Good
reviews.author: doug partain

reviews.title: Too much work to set an alarm
reviews.comment: The alarm menus are inconsistent and no default settings available to configure the alarm.
reviews.author: mohammedjunaid hundekar

reviews.comment: Intentions and promises from UI are the best..However this app has huge bugs in menu management\tI tried to change alarm time but got hilarious behavior also when tried to stop countdown laps etc. Maybe next release...
reviews.author: Franz remoter

reviews.title: Doesn\'t do what it says
reviews.comment: Downloaded the app for specific functionalities that it has listed in the description, only to find that those options aren\'t even options in the alarm settings.
reviews.author: Kayla Marie Gilbert

reviews.title: Dj
reviews.comment: Cool
reviews.author: Jordan W

reviews.title: Crazy preferences not a configuration
reviews.comment: \"Crazy preferences\" is actually an inconfigurable Mode (check box) with no documentation, not preferences. Cannot set to repeat every N minutes
reviews.author: Mats Ahlgren

reviews.title: Good looking but buggy
reviews.comment: I chose this over other timers because of nice design. But unfortunately it\'s actually quite buggy like many other users are saying.
reviews.author: Saikat Biswas

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: Very helpful
reviews.author: Karnesh Patel

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: It was hard to turn off!! Just what I needed
reviews.author: Gerardo Alvarez

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: It\'s great but it only has one problem it doesn\'t erase the time when your done.
reviews.author: Erin Diamond
